## :evergreen_tree: three.js iphone demo 

A small threejs demo in Gatsby showing a video playing on an Iphone model.

**installation**

```shell
git clone https://github.com/casvanluijtelaar/threejs-iphone.git
npm install
gatsby develop
```

**Credits**

* The video is a stock video from  [pexels.com](https://www.pexels.com/video/kid-running-in-the-field-holding-a-guitar-4444485/)
* The Iphone model can be found at [sketchfab.com](https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/apple-iphone-xs-max-08e76b5bd30847f6a23d4748b85ef62b)


```shell
git clone https://github.com/casvanluijtelaar/threejs-iphone.git
npm install
gatsby develop
```
